AboutUs.title: A little about us
AboutUs.firsttext: We are a domestic VPN project that allows you to use foreign services after they are blocked in the Russian Federation
AboutUs.secondtext: We opened at the very beginning of the blockades in 2022, and have been working steadily for over two years since then. We are located in reliable data centers in most of the world with Uptime 99.99%.

Reviews.title: Customer
Reviews.text1: I am very satisfied with the VPN service! Great speed, stable connection, ad blocking and ease of use for a pretty small price. I highly recommend it for use!
Reviews.text2: I have been using this VPN for more than half a year, it works extremely stable and fast, the admin responds quickly if there are any problems. I recommend WieldVPN to everyone!
Reviews.text3: I have been using this service for six months now. It is very easy to install and use, has high speed and always a stable connection. I have WieldVPN enabled almost all the time. If you have any questions, the support team is always ready to help around the clock!
Reviews.text4: As the most casual user who is not very knowledgeable, I can only say that the speed of the VPN is just bomb!!! I'm very happy because in my experience it's the best VPN I've used, also absolutely all my issues are solved quickly!
Reviews.text5: This is the best VPN I have ever used! Always at hand on all devices, has no problems with blocking. And if there are any problems, the support team will respond even deep into the night! Definitely with WieldVPN for a long time!
